title: DNS Poison Audit
description:
Billing pages redirect to phishing domains on some PCs.

Objective: Capture DNS requests/replies to detect and correct any poisoned entries.
dialogue: Mira: "Some of my friends are being redirected to fake billing pages. It smells like DNS poisoning!"
Mira: "Can you help me capture DNS traffic and spot any poisoned entries?"
hints: Filter for DNS packets to suspicious domains.
